children.text: The top of this wall has not been properly secured to hold it plumb with an 'L bracket' (or similar).
The Victorian Building Authority’s, Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 4.02 Verticality or Plumbness of Steel and Timber Frames and Exposed Posts, states that
‘Posts and wall frames are defective if they deviate from vertical by more than 5mm within any 1.8 metre height’.
This wall, and the walls that run into it will need to be re-plumbed and secured into their correct position prior to works in this area proceeding any further.
